about.summary: Provides a range of filters that can be applied to layers from the 'ggplot2' package and its extensions, along with other graphic elements such as guides and theme elements. The filters are applied at render time and thus uses the exact pixel dimensions needed.

Provides a range of filters that can be applied to layers from the 'ggplot2' package and its extensions, along with other graphic elements such as guides and theme elements. The filters are applied at render time and thus uses the exact pixel dimensions needed.

name: r-ggfx
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.3" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggfx
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggfx_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggfx/ggfx_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 154e96e4818ed31731db7b7bf07ff6a40e4b8368a4c3c64887ccf2734361f1f8

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gtable
    - r-magick >=2.7.1
    - r-ragg
    - r-rlang

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-gtable
    - r-magick >=2.7.1
    - r-ragg
    - r-rlang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggfx')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggfx')\""  # [win]


about:
  home: https://ggfx.data-imaginist.com, https://github.com/thomasp85/ggfx
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides a range of filters that can be applied to layers from the 'ggplot2' package and its extensions, along with other graphic elements such as guides and theme elements. The filters are applied at render time and thus uses the exact pixel dimensions needed.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Package: ggfx
# Title: Pixel Filters for 'ggplot2' and 'grid'
# Version: 1.0.1
# Authors@R: c(person(given = "Thomas Lin", family = "Pedersen", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "thomasp85@gmail.com", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-5147-4711")), person(given = "RStudio", role = c("cph", "fnd")))
# Description: Provides a range of filters that can be applied to layers from the 'ggplot2' package and its extensions, along with other graphic elements such as guides and theme elements. The filters are applied at render time and thus uses the exact pixel dimensions needed.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: magick (>= 2.7.1), ragg, grid, ggplot2, grDevices, gtable, rlang
# RoxygenNote: 7.2.1
# URL: https://ggfx.data-imaginist.com, https://github.com/thomasp85/ggfx
